posts.post_content:

Howard (SGC 35)        $170
Lafitte (SGC 20)           $80
Perdue (SGC 10)          $70
Violat (SGC 20)          $135

Price includes shipping. Please email requests/queries to: [url]mpeich12@gmail.com[/url].

Thanks for looking.

Cheers, Mike
